attributes.action: Rollout Plan B Now (Work from home) so as to prevent our NHS from Collapse!
attributes.additional_details: The Scientific and Medical Experts as well as NHS staff on the ground have spoken out and are currently being ignored in 10 Downing Street. It is better to act sooner rather than later whereby it may be too late to prevent a national winter health crises. With modern technology many people can work from home. Both the Scientific Advisory Group for Emergencies (SAGE) and The British Medical Association (BMA) have demonstrated homeworking to be the most effective key factor in reducing covid rates
attributes.background: Rollout Plan B Now: Working from Home causes minimum disruption but could save our NHS from being unable to cope this winter. The governmemt must listen to the scientists & medical experts (Sage), the BMA and the NHS, who currently have A&E waiting lists at 12 hours + due to a lack of beds!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599507
